resources.string: To get started, connect with your Microsoft Band.

To assassinate someone:
 Whack them with a spoon.
 
As the Assassin:
 1.) Get assigned a target.
 2.) Using the map, try to track your target and assassinate them.
 3.) The target will show up on the map when they are within 150 meters.
 
 As the Target:
 1.) Keep in mind that you are also being targeted by someone else, so be careful.
 2.)The Microsoft Band will notify you when your assassin is 50m of you.
 3.)If you get assassinated, you will get a confirmation notification
 4.)If you get assassinated, your target will get passed on to your assassin
 
 Last person standing wins!
